meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Andy Carlson Mahlon McLean Molly Redfield Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1593.

td.p: Andy Carlson, an office manager from Torrance, California
Mahlon McLean, a legal assistant from Fullerton, California
Molly Redfield, a Ph.D. candidate from Claremont, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,100)

tr.td: 20th CENTURY AMERICA
THE HUMAN BODY
WORD ORIGINS
FAMOUS FOLKS
BRAZIL
FIG FACTS

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Andy: What is fluorine?)

fluoride

MollyAndy
')
